title: A-House - Wide Eyed And Ignorant
description:
This album is simply fantastic. It shows off David Couse&#039;s clever wit with cynical digs at melancholy alt-rock. It is also a bit of a big at modern society, but in a fun way. The music is fun, bright pop music, with many textures and tones. The music style is a fusion of an eclectic mix, though the main one is Ringo Starr-style pop. Fave tracks (from the 13-song American release) include &#039;Spinster&#039;, &#039;Everything I am&#039;, &#039;She keeps me humble&#039;, &#039;Make me proud&#039; and &#039;Here come the good times&#039;. The last song is a refreshing change of pace from the negative nineties, as is a lot of this album (though not all of it).


01 Intro  
02 Here Come the Good Times  
03 She Keeps Me Humble  
04 Why Me?  
05 Make Me Proud  
06 Everything I Am  
07 Curious  
08 These Things  
09 The Comedy Is Over  
10 The Strong and the Silent  
11 Bg Talk  
12 Deadhead
